name: green-scarf
effect: Held: Increases the holder’s Smartness during a Super Contest’s Visual Competition.
short_effect: Raises the holder’s Smartness while in a contest.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A hold item that raises SMART in CONTESTS.
flavor_text.emerald: A hold item that raises SMART in CONTESTS.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An item to be held by a POKéMON. It boosts the holding POKéMON’s SMART condition in CONTESTS.
